notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!

taskDescription: A pharmacy offers students at a nearby college a discount. Jerry purchases ibuprofen, which had an original price of $15.80. The cost to Jerry after the student discount was $13.43. What is the percent discount for students at the pharmacy?
